text:
KARAIKUDI

Kamban Academy: Kamban festival, U. Sagayam, IAS, and senior advocate D. Ramalingam, R. Chokkalingam and Valli Muthiah speak, Krishna Kalyana Mandapam, 5 p.m.

Kamban Trust: Kamban Thirunal, former Supreme Court Judge AR. Lakshmanan, A.C. Muthiah and Meghalaya Governor V. Shanmuganathan speak, Kamban Manimandapam, 5.30 p.m.

Sri Sarada Niketan College for Women: 16{+t}{+h}Graduation Day, Meghalaya Governor V. Shanmuganathan delivers Draduation Day address, blessings by Swami Atmananda Maharaj, auditorium, 10.30 a.m.

SRIVILLIPUTTUR

Natchiar Temple: Andal thirukalyanam festival, procession of deities, 7 a.m. and 6 p.m.

KAMUTHI

Pasumpon U. Muthuramalinga Thevar Memorial College: NSS camp, Pasumpon, 10 a.m.

KRISHNANKOIL

Linga Global School (CBSE): First Kindergarten Graduation Day, Dr. Sivakama Sundari, senior specialist, paediatrician, obstetrician and gynaecologist, chief guest, Dr. K. Sridharan, Chancellor, Kalasalingam University, guest of honour, Dr. K.S. Krishnan Auditorium, 9.30 a.m.

SIVAKASI

Sri Kaliswari College: Two-day national conference on ‘Role of information and communication technology on the growth of service industries’, second day events, Prof. T. Shenbagavalli of East Point Group of Institution, Bangalore, and Dr. K. Krishnakumar of Periyar University speak, 9 a.m.; valedictory function, Dr. A. Mohamed Jaffar, Controller of Examinations, TNOU, Chennai, chief guest, A.P. Selvarajan, secretary, distributes certificates, 3 p.m.
title: ENGAGEMENTS
